Sentencas: An effective temperature controller for steam reformers is critical to ensure a high performance reforming process in the connection of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC).
Titulo: Control-oriented dynamic model optimization of steam reformer with an improved optimization algorithm

Sentencas: The establishment of a control-oriented dynamic model plays an important role in the development of a control system.
Titulo: Control-oriented dynamic model optimization of steam reformer with an improved optimization algorithm

Sentencas: In this work, a high-fidelity lumped parameter model for a steam reformer is constructed based on physical and chemical laws.
Titulo: Control-oriented dynamic model optimization of steam reformer with an improved optimization algorithm

Sentencas: In order to fit simulated data to experimental data, such as flow rate and temperature characteristics, a new identification method based on a breed particle swarm optimization (Breed PSO) algorithm is introduced for parameter identification.
Titulo: Control-oriented dynamic model optimization of steam reformer with an improved optimization algorithm

Sentencas: The results show that the identified model can achieve an accurate description of the actual plant and can be used to replace it for the development of a control system.
Titulo: Control-oriented dynamic model optimization of steam reformer with an improved optimization algorithm
